title: Get it white: color-tunable AC/DC OLEDs
title_cn: 变白：颜色可调的AC / DC OLED
abstract: Organic light-emitting diodes (OLEDs) have gained considerable attention because of their use of inherently flexible materials and their compatibility with facile roll-to-roll and printing processes. In addition to high efficiency, flexibility and transparency, reliable color tunability of solid state light sources is a desirable feature in the lighting and display industry. Here, we demonstrate a device concept for highly efficient organic light-emitting devices whose emission color can be easily adjusted from deep-blue through cold-white and warm-white to saturated yellow. Our approach exploits the different polarities of the positive and negative half-cycles of an alternating current (AC) driving signal to independently address a fluorescent blue emission unit and a phosphorescent yellow emission unit which are vertically stacked on top of each other. The electrode design is optimized for simple fabrication and driving and allows for two-terminal operation by a single source. The presented concept for color-tunable OLEDs is compatible with application requirements and versatile in terms of emitter combinations.
abstract_cn: 有机发光二极管（OLED）由于其固有的柔性材料的使用以及与便捷的卷对卷和印刷工艺的兼容性而备受关注。除了高效，柔韧性和透明性之外，固态光源的可靠颜色可调性也是照明和显示行业的理想功能。在这里，我们演示了一种高效有机发光器件的器件概念，该器件的发射颜色可以轻松地从深蓝色，冷白色和暖白色调整为饱和黄色。我们的方法利用交流电（AC）驱动信号的正半周和负半周的不同极性来独立寻址垂直堆叠的荧光蓝色发射单元和磷光黄色发射单元。电极设计经过优化，可简化制造和驱动，并允许通过单一电源进行两端子操作。提出的颜色可调OLED概念与应用要求兼容，并且在发射器组合方面具有多种用途。

title: A single-molecule multicolor electrochromic device generated through medium engineering
title_cn: 通过介质工程生成的单分子多色电致变色器件
abstract: Multicolor organic electrochromic materials are important for the generation of full-color devices. However, achieving multiple colors using a single-molecule material has proved challenging. In this study, a multicolor electrochromic prototype device is generated by integrating medium engineering/in situ ‘electro base’/laminated electrode technologies with the simple flying fish-shaped methyl ketone TM1. This multicolor electrochromic (green, blue and magenta) device is durable and has a high coloration efficiency (350 cm2 C−1), a fast switching time (50 ms) and superior reversibility. This study is a successful attempt to integrate solvatochromism and basochromism in an electronic display. This integration not only introduces a new avenue for color tuning, in addition to the structural design of the colorant, but will also inspire further developments in the tuning of many other properties by this medium engineering approach, such as conductance and the redox property, and thereby accelerate versatile applications in data recording, ultrathin flexible displays, and optical communication and sensing.
abstract_cn: 多色有机电致变色材料对于产生全色设备非常重要。但是，使用单分子材料实现多种颜色已证明具有挑战性。在这项研究中，通过将媒介工程/原位/电基层合/层压电极技术与简单的飞鱼形甲基酮TM1集成在一起，产生了一种多色电致变色原型设备。这种多色电致变色（绿色，蓝色和品红色）设备耐用且着色效率高（350＆＃8197; cm 2 ＆＃8197; C ＆＃8722; 1 ），快速切换时间（50＆＃8197; ms）和出色的可逆性。这项研究是在电子显示器中整合溶剂变色和碱变色的成功尝试。除了着色剂的结构设计外，这种集成不仅为色彩调节提供了新的途径，而且还将激发通过这种中等工程方法对许多其他性能进行调节的进一步发展，例如电导和氧化还原性能，以及从而加速了在数据记录，超薄柔性显示器以及光通信和传感方面的通用应用。

title: Carrier multiplication in germanium nanocrystals
title_cn: 锗纳米晶体中的载流子增殖
abstract: Carrier multiplication is demonstrated in a solid-state dispersion of germanium nanocrystals in a silicon–dioxide matrix. This is performed by comparing ultrafast photo-induced absorption transients at different pump photon energies below and above the threshold energy for this process. The average germanium nanocrystal size is approximately 5–6 nm, as inferred from photoluminescence and Raman spectra. A carrier multiplication efficiency of approximately 190% is measured for photo-excitation at 2.8 times the optical bandgap of germanium nanocrystals, deduced from their photoluminescence spectra.
abstract_cn: 在二氧化硅纳米基质中锗纳米晶体的固态分散体中证实了载流子的增殖。 这是通过比较此过程的阈值能量以下和以上的不同泵浦光子能量下的超快光诱导吸收瞬变来执行的。 从光致发光和拉曼光谱可以推断出，平均锗纳米晶体的尺寸约为5〜6〜8197 nm。 根据锗纳米晶体的光致发光光谱推断，在2.8倍于锗纳米晶体光学带隙的光激发下，载流子的载流子增殖效率约为190％。

title: Broadband tunable liquid crystal terahertz waveplates driven with porous graphene electrodes
title_cn: 多孔石墨烯电极驱动的宽带可调谐液晶太赫兹波片
abstract: Versatile devices, especially tunable ones, for terahertz imaging, sensing and high-speed communication, are in high demand. Liquid crystal based components are perfect candidates in the optical range; however, they encounter significant challenges in the terahertz band, particularly the lack of highly transparent electrodes and the drawbacks induced by a thick cell. Here, a strategy to overcome all these challenges is proposed: Few-layer porous graphene is employed as an electrode with a transmittance of more than 98%. A subwavelength metal wire grid is utilized as an integrated high-efficiency electrode and polarizer. The homogeneous alignment of a high-birefringence liquid crystal is implemented on both frail electrodes via a non-contact photo-alignment technique. A tunable terahertz waveplate is thus obtained. Its polarization evolution is directly demonstrated. Furthermore, quarter-wave plates that are electrically controllable over the entire testing range are achieved by stacking two cells. The proposed solution may pave a simple and bright road toward the development of various liquid crystal terahertz apparatuses.
abstract_cn: 对太赫兹成像，传感和高速通信的多功能设备，尤其是可调设备，提出了很高的要求。在光学范围内，基于液晶的组件是理想的选择。然而，它们在太赫兹频带中遇到了巨大的挑战，特别是缺少高度透明的电极以及由厚电池引起的缺点。在这里，提出了一种克服所有这些挑战的策略：几层多孔石墨烯被用作电极，其透射率超过98％。亚波长金属线栅被用作集成的高效电极和偏振器。高双折射液晶的均质取向通过非接触光取向技术在两个脆弱电极上实现。这样就获得了可调谐的太赫兹波片。直接证明了其极化演化。此外，通过堆叠两个电池可以在整个测试范围内实现电可控的四分之一波片。所提出的解决方案可以为开发各种液晶太赫兹设备铺平一条简单而光明的道路。

title: Femtojoule electro-optic modulation using a silicon–organic hybrid device
title_cn: 使用硅有机混合器件的飞焦耳电光调制
abstract: Energy-efficient electro-optic modulators are at the heart of short-reach optical interconnects, and silicon photonics is considered the leading technology for realizing such devices. However, the performance of all-silicon devices is limited by intrinsic material properties. In particular, the absence of linear electro-optic effects in silicon renders the integration of energy-efficient photonic–electronic interfaces challenging. Silicon–organic hybrid (SOH) integration can overcome these limitations by combining nanophotonic silicon waveguides with organic cladding materials, thereby offering the prospect of designing optical properties by molecular engineering. In this paper, we demonstrate an SOH Mach–Zehnder modulator with unprecedented efficiency: the 1-mm-long device consumes only 0.7 fJ bit−1 to generate a 12.5 Gbit s−1 data stream with a bit-error ratio below the threshold for hard-decision forward-error correction. This power consumption represents the lowest value demonstrated for a non-resonant Mach–Zehnder modulator in any material system. It is enabled by a novel class of organic electro-optic materials that are designed for high chromophore density and enhanced molecular orientation. The device features an electro-optic coefficient of r33≈180 pm V−1 and can be operated at data rates of up to 40 Gbit s−1.
